item.title: Trisara Phuket is embracing digital technology with its newest addition to the guest services portfolio
item.description:
Trisara Phuket introduces “The Director’s Den” (DDen), a first-of-its-kind digital lounge for guests to elevate their vacation memories. This unique service offers professional photo and video production, complete with storytelling and editing, to deliver shareable content within 24 hours. Kittisak Pattamasaevi, VP of Sales and Marketing at Montara Hospitality Group, which owns and manages Trisara, highlighted that luxury travelers often seek to capture their experiences but may lack the time or skills to do so effectively...
